forumNotes.author: bholston
forumNotes.content:
trying to convert to VistaPE V11. After entering Vistape.net/ archive and clicking ok, VistaPE MultiBoot V.11 dosn't appear on leftside of screen...  
Has anyone else had this issue.....

forumNotes.author: Brito
forumNotes.content:
Hi bholston.  

This is the hello world, where you're supposed to talk a bit about yourself.  

To get help at VistaPE, I'd seriously recommend looking at the VistaPE section on this site where all the other developers hang out.  

---  

For a start, I'd just advice you to run version 12 as it is the one currently used by more people that might help you.  

Please post again at the VistaPE section after trying version 12 and add as many details as possible.  

![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)
